definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.chinese: 真核生物包罗其它一切生物。

sentences.english: Dunhuang Grottoes is a history showing with image, including abundant subjects.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌石窟壁画艺术包罗万象，是一部形象的历史。

sentences.english: The report is authoritative, but this is not a comprehensive text.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告具有权威性，但文字并没有包罗万象。

sentences.english: Huishi's knowledge was all-inclusive. His works were fairly many.
sentences.chinese: 惠施的知识包罗万象，他的著作也极可观。

sentences.english: The universe contains everything that exists, from the tiniest subatomic particles to galactic superclusters.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙包罗万象，小至次原子粒子，大到银河超星系团。

sentences.english: Fleshly sense had been capable of grasping the whole.
sentences.chinese: 肉体的感官能包罗全体。

sentences.english: Folk art covers a wide range.
The all-embracing social welfare system facilitates people in their advanced age.
sentences.chinese: 包罗万象的社会福利系统给老人们提供了许多方便。

sentences.english: You can not possibly make an all-embracing proposal.
sentences.chinese: 你不可能提出一个包罗万象的建议。

sentences.english: This includes excavation and the placement of earth fill.
sentences.chinese: 土方工程包罗土方的发掘和换填。

sentences.english: Architecture is pretty much everything in one subject.
sentences.chinese: 建筑学是一门包罗万象的学科。

sentences.english: True history being a mixture of all things, the true historian mingles in everything.
sentences.chinese: 历史既然包罗一切，真正的历史学家便应过问一切。

sentences.english: Violence toward a family member, including child abuse or wife beating.
sentences.chinese: 对家庭成员施加的暴力，包罗凌虐儿童和殴打老婆。

sentences.english: The field of application development is very broad and all-encompassing.
sentences.chinese: 应用程序开发领域非常广泛，并且包罗万象。

sentences.english: A square inch place includes the infinite universe, small screen deduction in society all phenomena on earth.
sentences.chinese: 方寸之地包罗大千世界，小小荧屏演绎世间万象。

sentences.english: The health club includes a gym, mming pool , and locker room.
sentences.chinese: 健身俱乐部包罗体操房，泅水池和更衣室。
